summary.span: 提供用于浏览对象属性的用户界面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for browsing the properties of an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用属性网格，请 在父控件上创建类的新实例，并将设置 为要显示其属性的对象。To use the property grid, you create a new instance of the class on a parent control and set to the object to display the properties for. 网格中显示的信息是对象在分配时的快照。The information displayed in the grid is a snapshot of the properties at the time the object is assigned. 如果在运行时代码中更改了由指定的对象的属性值 ，则不会显示新值，直到网格中出现导致网格刷新的操作。If a property value of the object specified by the is changed in code at run time, the new value is not displayed until an action is taken in the grid that causes the grid to refresh. 属性网格中的 "属性" 选项卡显示为顶部工具栏上的按钮 ，在中定义的范围内可能会有所不同 。The property tabs within the property grid appear as buttons on the toolbar at the top of the , and can vary in scope as defined in the . 您可以使用 属性来显示大按钮，而不是默认的小按钮。You can use the property to display large buttons instead of the default smaller ones. 大按钮为 32 x 32 像素，而不是标准的 16 x 16 像素。Large buttons are 32-by-32 pixels rather than the standard 16-by-16 pixels. 当 app.config 文件包含以下条目时，将根据系统 DPI 设置调整大按钮、小按钮和属性列表扩展器图标 (的) 调整大小：The large and small buttons and the property list expander icons (the plus or minus icons) are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 控件最初不在开发环境的 "工具箱" 中显示。The control is not initially presented in the toolbox in the development environment. 您可以将属性网格添加到 "工具箱" 中，这使您能够将拖 放到窗体上。You can add a property grid to the toolbox, which enables you to drag a onto your form. 还可以 通过在源代码中添加适当的代码来定义的实例。You can also define an instance of by adding the appropriate code in your source code. 默认情况下，的所有公共属性 都将显示在中 。All public properties of the will be displayed in the by default. 您可以隐藏属性，使其不会显示在控件中，方法是将 其与进行修饰 ，并将值设置为 `false` 。You can hide a property so that it is not displayed in the control by decorating it with the and setting the value to `false`. 通过向提供类别，可以指定属性在中显示的类别 。You can specify the category that a property appears in by providing a category with the . 你可以通过使用为显示在控件底部的属性提供描述性文本 。You can provide descriptive text for your property that appears at the bottom of the control by using the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建属性网格并在窗体上设置其位置。The following code example illustrates creating a property grid and setting its location on a form. 此示例要求在窗体上有一个 。This example requires that you have a form with a on it. [!code-cpp[Classic PropertyGrid Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyGrid Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PropertyGrid Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyGrid Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PropertyGrid Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyGrid Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `PropertyGrid1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `PropertyGrid1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性时，网格上属性排序按钮的外观将发生变化，以反映属性的当前状态。When you set the property, the appearance of the property sort buttons on the grid changes to reflect the current state of the property. 如果设置 为， 则按检索属性的顺序显示属性。Setting to causes the properties to be displayed in the order they were retrieved. 设置 为和均与 单独设置相同 。Setting to both and is the same as setting to alone. 分类视图始终显示为字母。The categorized view is always shown as alphabetical. > [!NOTE] > 若要执行自定义排序，请在 组件上实现以按所需顺序返回属性。To do custom sorting, implement on the component to return the properties in the desired order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用属性初始化控件 。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control using the , properties. 此外，此示例还将 控件的 属性设置为，以便在 `false` 运行该示例时不显示网格。In addition, this example sets the control's property to `false` so the grid will not be visible when the example is run. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializePropertyGrid` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用方法。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializePropertyGrid` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 若要在窗体运行时查看属性网格，请将网格的 属性更改为 `true` ，重新编译并重新运行该窗体。To view the property grid when the form is running, change the grid's property to `true`, recompile, and rerun the form. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用属性初始化控件 。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control using the , properties. 此外，此示例还将 控件的 属性设置为，以便在 `false` 运行该示例时不显示网格。In addition, this example sets the control's property to `false` so the grid will not be visible when the example is run. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializePropertyGrid` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用方法。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializePropertyGrid` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 若要在窗体运行时查看属性网格，请将网格的 属性更改为 `true` ，重新编译并重新运行该窗体。To view the property grid when the form is running, change the grid's property to `true`, recompile, and rerun the form. of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性旨在提供 Windows 窗体控件之间的视觉兼容性，这些控件使用类呈现文本 ，.NET Framework 1.0 和使用类执行自定义文本呈现的 .NET Framework 1.1 应用程序之间的兼容性 。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and .NET Framework 1.0 and .NET Framework 1.1 applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果你的应用程序不是从 .NET Framework 1.0 或 .NET Framework 1.1 升级，则建议你将 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 设置为的默认值 `false` 。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from .NET Framework 1.0 or .NET Framework 1.1, it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. .NET Framework 2.0 中引入了基于 GDI 的类，以提高性能，使文本更好地显示，并改善对国际字体的支持。The GDI based class was introduced in the .NET Framework 2.0 to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，使用基于 GDI + 的 类来执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the GDI+ based class was used to perform all text rendering. GDI 用不同于 GDI + 计算字符间距和自动换行。GDI calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from GDI+. 在使用类呈现文本的 Windows 窗体应用程序中 ，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本与 应用程序中的其他文本显示不相同。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决这种不兼容性问题，可以将 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 特定控件的属性设置为 `true` 。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` `true` 为应用程序中的所有受支持的控件设置，请 使用参数调用方法 `true` 。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.
